title: New: Tachyons – Burn
body:
Can’t tell you much about at all about **Tachyons** – with a Soundcloud featuring an Odesza remix and their debut original, _Burn_, information is purposefully scarce.

The aforementioned first offering is a SOHN meets James Blake-esque electronic number, yet manages to feel like more than merely a cheap imitation, especially on the super slick chorus. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Can’t tell you much about at all about Tachyons – with a Soundcloud featuring an Odesza remix and their debut original, Burn, information is purposefully scarce. The aforementioned first offering is a SOHN meets James Blake-esque electronic number, yet manages to feel like more than merely a cheap imitation, especially on the super slick chorus. \[…\]
